ValidationRule.description: Checks for Old/Past End Dates on Campaigns when Status = 'Planned', 'Approved', 'In Progress' for New campaigns or if the status is changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId != "00e30000000bvR3", /*System Administrator*/ OR( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Planned"), ISPICKVAL(Status , "Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Status , "In Progress") ), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Status) ), EndDate <= TODAY() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Campaign End Date cannot be a past date for Campaign Status = 'Planned' OR 'Approved' OR 'In Progress' status.
